items.title: WATCH:  Zoo in ‘race against time’ to clone endangered species
items.description: A team from the San Diego Zoo is doing what they can to prevent species from going extinct by cloning animals with preserved DNA.

items.title: Tropical Storm Barry forms off eastern coast of Mexico
items.description: A depression that was formerly Tropical Storm Barry is dumping rain on eastern Mexico as Tropical Storm Flossie brews off its southwestern Pacific coa...

items.title: 2 killed in Idaho after firefighters ambushed by gunfire, suspected gunman found dead
items.description: Firefighters were ambushed by a gunman while responding to a brush fire in Coeur d'Alene, Idaho, on Sunday, according to the local sheriff's office.
